DEMONHUNTER_HAVOC:
Use Power Infusion on the HAVOC DEMON HUNTER when:

  • The Demon Hunter is under the effect of Metamorphosis.
  • The encounter will end within 20 seconds or less.
DRUID_BALANCE:
Use Power Infusion on the Balance Druid when:

  • The Balance Druid is actively channeling Celestial Alignment or Incarnation: Chosen of Elune to maximize their burst damage window.
  • They are casting Convoke the Spirits during a critical phase of the encounter.
  • Their primary cooldowns align with a high-priority target or execute phase (e.g., during Eclipse transitions for optimal spell synergy).
DRUID_FERAL:
Use Power Infusion on the Feral Druid when:

  • The Feral Druid has the Bloodtalons buff active to amplify their next damaging abilities.
  • The Feral Druid does not have the Berserk talent, increasing reliance on external cooldowns for burst damage.
EVOKER_DEVASTATION:
Use Power Infusion on the DEVASTATION EVOKER when:

  • Dragonrage is active and one of the following applies: Shattering Star is on cooldown, the target has Shattering Star's debuff, or there are 2 or more enemies.
  • The encounter will end in less than 35 seconds to ensure the buff covers critical final damage.
HUNTER_MARKSMANSHIP:
Use Power Infusion on the Marksmanship Hunter when:

  • The Hunter's Trueshot is active with more than 12 seconds remaining on its duration.
  • The remaining encounter time is less than 13 seconds.
HUNTER_SURVIVAL:
Use Power Infusion on the Survival Hunter when:

  • Coordinated Assault is active during their burst window.
  • The Hunter does not have Coordinated Assault and has used Spearhead (Spearhead is on cooldown).
  • The Hunter has neither Coordinated Assault nor Spearhead talents selected.
MAGE_ARCANE:
Use Power Infusion on the ARCANE MAGE when:

  • The mage is not using Spymaster’s Web and their last cast was Arcane Surge.
  • The mage is using Spymaster’s Web and their last cast was Evocation.
MAGE_FIRE:
Use Power Infusion on the FIRE MAGE when:

  • Combustion is about to come off cooldown (within the pre-cast preparation time).
  • Combustion is active and has more than 7 seconds remaining.
  • The encounter is about to end within 20 seconds.
MAGE_FROST:
Use Power Infusion on the FROST MAGE when:

  • Power Infusion is not currently active on the Mage.
  • The Mage is activating a major offensive cooldown such as Icy Veins or Freezing Winds.
  • The Mage is in their burst window with active trinket or temporary damage buffs.
MONK_WINDWALKER:
Use Power Infusion on the Windwalker Monk when:

  • The Monk's Xuen, the White Tiger is active and they are not under the effect of Bloodlust.
  • The Monk's Xuen, the White Tiger is active, they are under the effect of Bloodlust, and their Strike of the Windlord ability is on cooldown.
PALADIN_RETRIBUTION:
Use Power Infusion on the Retribution Paladin when:

  • The Paladin has Avenging Wrath active.
  • The Paladin has Crusade active.
  • The target is affected by the Execution Sentence debuff.
PRIEST_SHADOW:
Use Power Infusion on the SHADOW PRIEST when:

  • The Shadow Priest is in Voidform.
  • The Shadow Priest has Dark Ascension active.
  • The Shadow Priest has the TWW2 4-Piece Set Bonus equipped.
ROGUE_ASSASSINATION:
Use Power Infusion on the ASSASSINATION ROGUE when:

  • Their Deathmark ability is actively dealing damage to the target.
ROGUE_SUBTLETY:
Use Power Infusion on the SUBTLETY ROGUE when:

  • They have Shadow Dance active, as this aligns with their burst window for maximum damage amplification.
SHAMAN_ELEMENTAL:
Use Power Infusion on the ELEMENTAL SHAMAN when:

  • They have Ascendance actively enhancing their abilities.
  • Ascendance’s cooldown has more than 30 seconds remaining, ensuring it won’t be available for a significant period.
SHAMAN_ENHANCEMENT:
Use Power Infusion on the Enhancement Shaman when:

  • Their Ascendance buff is active.
  • They activate Feral Spirit.
  • Their Doom Winds buff is active.
  • The encounter is in its final 20 seconds.
  • Their major cooldowns are available (2 minutes or more remaining).
WARLOCK_AFFLICTION:
Use Power Infusion on the AFFLICTION WARLOCK when:

  • Their major cooldowns (e.g., Summon Darkglare) are active to maximize burst damage during critical phases.
  • They are executing a pre-planned damage window aligned with raid mechanics or encounter-specific timings.
WARLOCK_DEMONOLOGY:
Use Power Infusion on the DEMONOLOGY WARLOCK when:

  • The warlock’s Wild Imps are about to despawn within two global cooldowns plus the cast time of Summon Demonic Tyrant.
  • They’ve just cast Hand of Gul’dan or Ruination to empower or summon imps.
  • The imps’ despawn timer is within one global cooldown plus the cast time of Summon Demonic Tyrant, ensuring maximum uptime during their burst window.
WARLOCK_DESTRUCTION:
Use Power Infusion on the DESTRUCTION WARLOCK when:

  • Their Infernal is active during a burst window.
  • They do not have the Summon Infernal talent (use on cooldown).
  • The encounter is ending soon, and they cannot summon another Infernal before it concludes.
WARRIOR_ARMS:
Use Power Infusion on the ARMS WARRIOR when:

  • The target is affected by Colossus Smash and the encounter has more than 135 seconds remaining.
  • The warrior is in the Execute Phase (target below 20% health) and has Avatar active.
  • The encounter is in its final 25 seconds.
WARRIOR_FURY:
Use Power Infusion on the FURY WARRIOR when:

  • During the Execute phase (target below 20% health) while the Fury Warrior has Avatar active.
  • The Fury Warrior has Avatar active and the remaining encounter time allows the full duration of Power Infusion (over 2 minutes remaining).
  • In the final 25 seconds of the encounter to maximize damage output before the fight ends.
